channel.title: Lists on Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Lists on Personal Blog

item.title: Scala Ecosystem
item.description: Frameworks play framework Libraries ZIO - A library that competes with cats-effect. Cats, Cats effect Circe - a typesafe ecosystem Http4s - typesafe ecosystem. Doobie - a library for doing SQL. belongs to the typesafe ecosystem. Slick - a library for SQL. Akka - a library for that implements the actor model in Scala. Spark - Big data processing. Nice framework for stream and batch processing.

item.title: Quotes
item.description: intellect vs IQ Intellect is a measure of interest in abstract concepts or ideas, while IQ measures processing speed, verbal ability, problem-solving capacity and working memory.

item.title: Interesting Articles/Books
item.description: Learning Learning is remembering [Anki-esque tool] https://saveall.ai/add Distributed systems Data driven Club How complex systems fail Software Engineering The Manager Handbook You want modules, not microservices

item.title: My Dictionary
item.description: alteration: the action or the process of altering or being altered alter: change in character or composition, typically in a comparatively small but significant way Example: learning is an alteration of long-term memory Palatable: (of a food or drink) pleasant to taste (of an action or proposal) acceptable or satisfactory

item.title: Blogs
item.description: Table of Contents Internet/Technology Software engineering Technology Maggie - visual essays about programming, design and anthropology. Software Engineering Big Netflix, Dropbox, Cloudflare, Spotify Scala: autoscout24.com Software Engineering Nano Tristan Hume - Good stuff about Rust Irrational Exuberance - Blog about engineering management and life in general The manager handbook - Engineering management strikes again Alex Maccaw - Nice guy
